25  TaskModel::TaskModel(AbsRTTask* t)
26  : _rtTask(t), active(false),
27  _insertTime(0), _threshold(INT_MAX)
28  {
29  }

31  TaskModel::~TaskModel()
32  {
33  }
34 
35  bool TaskModel::TaskModelCmp::operator()(TaskModel* a, TaskModel* b)
36  {
37  if (a->getPriority() < b->getPriority()) return true;
38  else if (a->getPriority() == b->getPriority()) {
39  if (a->getInsertTime() < b->getInsertTime()) return true;
40  else if (a->getInsertTime() == b->getInsertTime())
41  if (a->getTaskNumber() < b->getTaskNumber()) return true;
42  }
43  return false;
44  }
45 
46  void TaskModel::setActive()
47  {
48  active = true;
49  }
50 
51  void TaskModel::setInactive()
52  {
53  active = false;
54  }
55 
56  bool TaskModel::isActive()
57  {
58  return active;
59  }

63  Scheduler::Scheduler(): Entity(""), _kernel(0), _queue(), _tasks(), _currExe(0)
64  {
65  }

69 
70  void Scheduler::enqueueModel(TaskModel* model)
71  {
72  AbsRTTask* task = model->getTask();
73 
74  if (find(task) != NULL) throw RTSchedExc("Element already present");
75 
76  _tasks[task] = model;
77  }
78 
79  TaskModel* Scheduler::find(AbsRTTask* task)
80  {
81  map<AbsRTTask*, TaskModel*>::iterator mi = _tasks.find(task);
82 
83  if (mi == _tasks.end())
84  return NULL;
85  else return (*mi).second;
86  }
87 
88  void Scheduler::setKernel(AbsKernel* k)
89  {
90  _kernel = k;
91  }
92 
93  void Scheduler::insert(AbsRTTask* task) throw(RTSchedExc, BaseExc)
94  {
95  DBGENTER("Scheduler");
96 
97  TaskModel* model = find(task);
98 
99  if (model == NULL) {
100  cerr << "Scheduler::insert Task model not found" << endl;
101  cerr << "For task " << taskname(task) << endl;
102  cerr << "Scheduler " << getName() << endl;
103  throw RTSchedExc("AbsRTTaskNotFound");
104  }
105 
106  model->setInsertTime(SIMUL.getTime());
107  model->setActive();
108 
109  _queue.insert(model);
110 
111 
112  }
113 
114  void Scheduler::extract(AbsRTTask* task) throw(RTSchedExc, BaseExc)
115  {
116  TaskModel* model = find(task);
117 
118  if (model == NULL) // raise an exception
119  throw RTSchedExc("AbsRTTask not found");
120 
121  _queue.erase(model);
122  model->setInactive();
123  }
124 
125  int Scheduler::getPriority(AbsRTTask* task) throw(RTSchedExc)
126  {
127  TaskModel* model = find(task);
128 
129  if (model == NULL)
130  throw RTSchedExc("AbsRTTask not found");
131 
132  return model->getPriority();
133  }

142  int Scheduler::getThreshold(AbsRTTask* task) throw(RTSchedExc)
143  {
144  TaskModel* model = find(task);
145 
146  if (model == NULL)
147  throw RTSchedExc("AbsRTTask not found");
148 
149  return model->getThreshold();
150  }
151 
152  void Scheduler::setThreshold(AbsRTTask *task, const int th) throw(RTSchedExc)
153  {
154  TaskModel* model = find(task);
155 
156  if (model == NULL)
157  throw RTSchedExc("AbsRTTask not found");
158 
159  model->setThreshold(th);
160  }

162  int Scheduler::enableThreshold(AbsRTTask* task)
163  throw(RTSchedExc)
164  {
165  TaskModel* model = find(task);
166 
167  if (model == NULL)
168  throw RTSchedExc("AbsRTTask not found");
169 
170 // if (oldPriorities.find(task) == oldPriorities.end())
171  oldPriorities[task] = model->getPriority();
172 // else
173 // oldPriorities[t] = model->getPriority();
174 
175  extract(task);
176 
177  int tmp = model->getThreshold();
178 
179  //TODO: add some logic to avoid using or minimize threshold
180 
181  model->changePriority(tmp);
182 
183  insert(task);
184 
185  return tmp;
186  }
187 
188  void Scheduler::disableThreshold(AbsRTTask *task) throw(RTSchedExc)
189  {
190  //TODO: remove the old priority from the oldPriorities map
191  TaskModel* model = find(task);
192 
193  if (model == NULL)
194  throw RTSchedExc("AbsRTTask not found");
195 
196  extract(task);
197 
198  model->changePriority(model->getPriority());
199 
200  insert(task);
201 
202  _kernel->dispatch();
203  }
204 
205  void Scheduler::discardTasks(bool f)
206  {
207  typedef map<AbsRTTask*, TaskModel*>::iterator IT;
208 
209  _queue.clear();
210 
211  IT i = _tasks.begin();
212 
213  if (f) {
214  while (i != _tasks.end()) {
215  delete ((*i).second);
216  i++;
217  }
218  }
219 
220  _tasks.clear();
221  }
222 
223  AbsRTTask* Scheduler::getTaskN(unsigned int n)
224  {
225  DBGENTER("Kernel");
226 
227  if ( _queue.size() <= n ) {
228 
229  return NULL;
230  }
231 
232  priority_list<TaskModel*, TaskModel::TaskModelCmp>::iterator it =
233  _queue.begin();
234  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++) it++;
235 
236 
237 
238  return (*it)->getTask();
239  }
240 
241  void Scheduler::notify(AbsRTTask* task)
242  {
243  DBGENTER("Kernel");
244  _currExe = task;
245 
246  }
247 
248  void Scheduler::newRun()
249  {
250  _queue.clear();
251 
252  typedef map<AbsRTTask*, TaskModel*>::iterator IT;
253 
254  for (IT i = _tasks.begin(); i != _tasks.end(); ++i)
255  i->second->setInactive();
256  }
257 
258  void Scheduler::endRun()
259  {
260  }
261 
262  void Scheduler::print()
263  {
264  priority_list<TaskModel*, TaskModel::TaskModelCmp>::iterator it =
265  _queue.begin();
266 
267  DBGPRINT("Ready queue: ");
268  for (; it != _queue.end(); ++it)
269  DBGPRINT_2(taskname((*it)->getTask()), " -> ");
270  }
271 
272  AbsRTTask* Scheduler::getFirst()
273  {
274  return getTaskN(0);
275 
276  }
